descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Become a wizard apprentice and engage in duels with other sorcerers, casting spells with your wand by drawing specific shapes. As you defeat your enemies you'll unlock new spells.

# Features:
- Choose between 15 different spells to cast (with more to come!): Different spells are not just the same projectile with a different color, each spell is balanced with pros and cons and is better suited for different situations.

- Complex combat system: Learn to counter every enemy spell accordingly, you can dodge, deflect, block, interrupt, or use a spell defensibly. Enemies will adapt too, and block your attacks easily if you repeat them.

- Feel like a wizard: basic spells have no annoying mana system or spells cooldown, you can cast any spell you've learned any time you want, like a true wizard! You'll rely on your speed, precision and knowledge for using the right spell at the right time to survive.

- Cast charged spells: as you progress you'll learn to cast charged spells, a more powerful version of a basic spell you know. They take power charge to cast but are far more powerful.

- Powered by Unreal Engine 5: While in early development, the game has a big focus on optimization, so with future updates it can really use all of UE5 power to bring the best possible graphics to the quest.

- Your imagination is the limit: the gameplay is designed to limit you as little as possible, you can defeat your enemies every way you want, and use spells in creative ways.

More features coming soon!
